alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:56AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy rains will impact Windham County through 1030 AM EDT... At 855 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sprague, or near Jewett City, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of heavy rainfall are forecast to continue this morning and afternoon. If prolonged heavy rainfall rates continue to occur over these areas, a flash flood warning may be issued. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Windham, Plainfield, Willimantic, Killingly, Southbridge, Putnam, Thompson, Brooklyn, Woodstock, Willington, Canterbury, Ashford, Pomfret, Sterling, Chaplin, Hampton, Eastford, Scotland and Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
